    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ARInstruction, ARIntroduction, CMIntro, EndTest, MainActivity, NSExAnswer, NSIntroduction, QuestionActivity, RTInstruction, RTPractice, RTStart, SVInstruction, SVPractice, TMInstruction, TMMoreInstr, TMPractice, TMRunner, VSInstruction

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Base activity. This class is extended by all activities in the project. It contains common code that applies to all activities.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void finishSection()
      A dummy method overriden by all subclasses to implement specific finish section logic.
      protected int getBlockId(int set)
      Finds the block ID by analyzing the questions in the set.
      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, android.content.Intent data)
      Back-propagate the JSON data from the finish activity to the main activity so that it can be sent to droid survey to collect the JSON data accumulated during the entire survey.
      void onBackPressed()
      Override the back press for all activities as we do not allow the user to go back on any activity.
      protected void onDestroy()
      Unregister all receivers to prevent leaks in case the application is destroyed due to any issue.
      protected void prepareFilter()
      Prepare broadcast filters for all activities except reaction time.
      protected void prepareRTFilter()
      Prepare broadcast filters for reaction time activities.
      protected void setNext(java.lang.Class nextClass)
      Set the functionality of clicking the next button to move to next class.

    • Field Detail

      • mContext

        protected static android.content.Context mContext
        reference to the current Activity context.

      • mTimer

        protected Timer mTimer
        the timer that is used across all questions in the survey.

      • mFtWarn

        protected boolean mFtWarn
        first-time warning for not answered. Shown only once.

      • mReceiver

        protected android.content.BroadcastReceiver mReceiver
        Broadcast receiver. This receiver receives intents for quitting the section, resuming the section at the end of 3 minutes. It also receives intents when no answer has been selected, and to activate the next button after a period of 5 seconds to prevent constant clicking of the button by the user.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Override the back press for all activities as we do not allow the user to go back on any activity.
        Overrides:
        onBackPressed in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • finishSection

        protected void finishSection()
        A dummy method overriden by all subclasses to implement specific finish section logic.

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                android.content.Intent data)
        Back-propagate the JSON data from the finish activity to the main activity so that it can be sent to droid survey to collect the JSON data accumulated during the entire survey.
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - 1, the code sent throughout the application
        resultCode - RESULT_OK
        data - the intent with the JSON data.

      • onDestroy

        protected void onDestroy()
        Unregister all receivers to prevent leaks in case the application is destroyed due to any issue.
        Overrides:
        onDestroy in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity

      • prepareFilter

        protected void prepareFilter()
        Prepare broadcast filters for all activities except reaction time.

      • prepareRTFilter

        protected void prepareRTFilter()
        Prepare broadcast filters for reaction time activities. Does not include the WARNING, NOANSWER and ACTIVENEXT filters used in the prepareRTFilter.

      • getBlockId

        protected int getBlockId(int set)
        Finds the block ID by analyzing the questions in the set.
        Parameters:
        set - the questions in the set
        Returns:
        the block number.

      • setNext

        protected void setNext(java.lang.Class nextClass)
        Set the functionality of clicking the next button to move to next class.
        Parameters:
        nextClass - the class which needs to be opened to clicking next button.
